entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • basicargumentprovider.implicitargumentswitching is flaky #66533
  • Analyzer dependency loading is different in shadow copy scenarios. #66532
    17.6
  • Disallow MethodImplOptions.Synchronized for async lambdas #66530
  • Integration Tests fails with assertion #66527

Closed

  • Enabling inline diagnostics results in stale "Avoid multiple blank lines" diagnostic #66345
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Unused parameter analyzer shouldn't warn for methods that only throw #66535
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66534
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix property initialization issue in KeyValueLogMessage #66531
    Area-IDE
  • Make SymbolDisplay show nullable enum values as enums #66528
    Area-Compilers
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Disregard static abstract methods as entrypoint candidates #66525
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.4 #66456
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Inline diagnostics - fix multiple blank lines bug #66468
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66482
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.6
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix serialization of CSharpIdeCodeStyleOptions.Common options #66501
    Area-IDE, Pending director approval
  • Add assert failure to fatal error helper #66524
    Area-IDE
